Sie unterstÃ¼tzt Funktionen wie die Screenshot-Suche nach Ã¤hnlichen Artikeln mit einem Klick, Anfragen zu Verkaufs- und Preistrends, Downloads von Produktmaterial, Benachrichtigungen zu WangWang und Bestellnachrichten, Aufteilen und Kombinieren von Phrasen, Herunterladen und Analysieren von Bewertungen sowie den Export von Produkten aus dem gesamten GeschÃ¤ft. Wir hoffen, Ihr aufmerksamer GeschÃ¤ftspartner zu werden.

long.en:
The 1688 Purchasing Assistant Plugin Edition is an extension produced by the official 1688 platform, dedicated to helping users enhance their procurement and operational efficiency. It supports functions such as one-click screenshot search for similar items, sales and price trend inquiries, product material downloads, WangWang and order message notifications, phrase splitting and combining, review downloads and analysis, and full-store product exports. We hope to become your thoughtful business partner.

ğŸ¥³Currently, the plugin supports the following functions:
1.ã€One-Click Screenshot Search for Similar Itemsã€‘ Take screenshots on any website to search for similar items on platforms like 1688, Taobao, Amazon, JD.com, and Pinduoduo. It supports multiple convenient screenshot methods, allowing you to choose based on your operating habits, such as right-click screenshots and keyboard shortcut screenshots.
2.ã€Multi-Platform Price Comparisonã€‘ The image search and price comparison results support 1688, Taobao, Amazon, AliExpress, and Alibaba, with plans to continuously expand to more platforms, making it convenient for you to compare across multiple platforms and find the best suppliers.
3.ã€Image Search Result Filtering and Sortingã€‘ Image search results support multiple filtering conditions, such as "Only Factories," "Supports One-Piece Orders," "Free Shipping," and "Confidential Shipping." You can also sort the results based on price, sales volume, and dropshipping volume according to your needs, efficiently locating the desired products.
4.ã€Export Product Images and Materialsã€‘ Supports batch downloads of image and video materials. Compare prices for the same item, customize product information filtering, and export as Excel files for convenient procurement and inventory management.
5.ã€View Product Sales/Price Trendsã€‘ On the 1688 product detail page, you can view product listing dates, update dates, transaction trends, price trends, and price-quantity relationships, aiding in business decisions and insights. Provided directly by 1688 official data, it is efficient, accurate, and authentic.
6.ã€Distribution and Inventory Managemenã€‘ Distribution users can switch to distribution mode through image search results, view more product distribution data and information, support multi-selection of image search results, and one-click inventory management.
7.ã€WangWang and Order Information Push Notificationsã€‘ Supports WangWang message and logistics order information push notifications to avoid missing business opportunities.
8.ã€Search for Products Across the Entire Networkã€‘ With the function to search for product titles across the entire network, you can quickly find similar products for comprehensive comparison, facilitating the selection of the most cost-effective suppliers and maximizing procurement efficiency.
9.ã€Phrase Splitting and Combiningã€‘ On the 1688 product detail page, you can conveniently split and combine any title to quickly generate new product titles. Our AI assistant will select the best title for you, helping improve search engine exposure, increase product visibility, and make your products more attractive!
10.ã€Shipping Cost Inquiryã€‘ On the 1688 product detail page, easily view the shipping cost details of the product to help you conduct precise cost assessments for more reasonable procurement strategies.
11.ã€Review Analysisã€‘ On the 1688 product detail page, gain insights into user feedback through review analysis. The AI system will summarize the review content and provide multi-dimensional evaluations to help you identify problems and opportunities.
12.ã€Export All Store Productsã€‘On the 1688 product detail page, one-click export of all product information in the store facilitates centralized management and subsequent data analysis, enhancing operational efficiency.
